page.title: 14HOUSING (East Block)
page.content: In sq.9569 there is a mixture of modest{private houses}and{bungalows {and a council housing estate}which are roughly divided by Skellingthorpe Road, which has private semi-detached houses on both sides which are about 50-60 years old. The{council houses {are 40-50 years old}and are built of brick. They all have gardens but not many had a garage or space for a car, and the roads were narrow. There were no grassed areas. There are some newer private bungalows which are about 25 years old and are semi-detached and detached. They all have gardens and garages. There are large patches of grass in front of them. There is also an{old peoples' home}which is warden controlled and built of brick.It is two stories high and surrounded by lawns and gardens.
